Uses of Package
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment

Packages that use gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment
Package
Description
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.converter
The converter package contains classes for parsing and converting HL7 V2 messages, segments and datatypes into FHIR Bundles, Resources and datatypes respectively.
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment
This package contains the definition for parsers that parse HL7 V2 Groups and Segments defined for the various types of HL7 Messages.
  • Classes in gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment used by gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.converter
    Class
    Description
    StructureParser
    This is the base interface for parsers of HL7 Structures (segments and groups).
  • Classes in gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment used by gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment
    Class
    Description
    AbstractSegmentParser
    A SegmentParser parses segments of the specified type.
    AbstractStructureParser
    This is an abstract implementation for StructureParser instances used by the MessageParser.
    FieldHandler
    A handler for processing field conversions in a Segment of a V2 message.
    StructureParser
    This is the base interface for parsers of HL7 Structures (segments and groups).
